title: Peer-Led Literature Circle Discussion Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic literary analysis skills and digital device utilization capabilities
context.additional_context: Short intensive course conducted in smartphone-based limited-technology environments, with continuous learning effect monitoring through formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can generate at least three queries reflecting diverse perspectives in peer-led discussions.
Learners can achieve over 80% participation in discussions based on thematic and character analysis of literary works.
Learners can understand discussion contribution methods according to personality types and apply them contextually.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
